revisionDesc.change: Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)

body.p:
i should have sent you this letter from George but thought of course you knew all about his arrival at AnapolisAnnapolis i saw his name in the times with 500 others arrived) my not hearing from you we thought you had gone there to see him the letter was missent to boston Boston so it was some days before i got it i expects him home every hour i am very sorry in deed you did not know he was exchanged) Jeffy has gone to Wheeling he was so delayed in getting there mattyMatty had A letter from him yesterday saying he would not be able
to come to Washington till after he came back but will surely come you dint didn't write Walt how you are whether you are well or any thing about your affairs write all about things we are all pretty well except sis she has A very bad could cold and is not well no more
